column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Mako says : " Tenzin 's just trying to help you become the best Avatar you can be . "
#Text=Korra says : " Of course you take his side . "
#Text=Mako says : " I 'm not taking his side . "
#Text=Korra says : " You know , sometimes I wonder whose side you 're on . "
#Text=Mako says : " There are n't any sides ! "
#Text=Korra says : " How could you take his side ? "
#Text=Mako says : " What 's with you and sides ? "
#Text=Korra says : " Well , excuse me , officer !
#Text=" Korra says : " So , what ?
#Text=Are you ... breaking up with me ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Yeah ... I guess I am .
#Text=" Wu says : " Now that 's a breakup !
#Text=" Mako says : " After that , I dove into my work .
#Text=Someone had been taking out supply ships heading to the Southern Water Tribe .
#Text=Asami 's company was one of the victims , so she and I worked together to catch the perps .
#Text=The stakeout was the perfect way to get my mind off Korra .
#Text=It was an intense night .
#Text=Asami and I discovered the triads had double - crossed us .
#Text=We barely got away , but by then , Asami 's warehouse had been cleared out .
#Text="
